verses.content: Chu Melkizedek chu Salem lal, Pathien Chunghnungtak Thiem- pu, Abraham lalhai thata a hung tieng lo tuoka malsâwmtu a nih.
Ama chu Abrahamin iengkim sâwma pakhat a pêk a. A hming umzie chu a hmasatakah Felna Lal a na, a dawtah Salem lal a ni bawk a, chu chu Remna Lal tina a nih.
Ama chu pa nei loin, nu nei loin, chi thlatuhai chanchin nei loin, um ṭanna nei loin, hring tâwp khawm nei chuong loin, Pathien Naupa anga siema umin, Thiempuah a um zing a nih.
Chuongchun, chi thlatu Abra- hamin a râllâk ṭha po sâwma pakhat a ipêk chu, chu mihriem ropuizie chu ngaituo ta u.

Levi thlahai laia thiempu sin chang taphawt chun Dân thu angin mihai kuoma inthawkin sâwma pakhat lâkna thu an hmu ngei a nih, chu chu an unauhaia inthawkin a nih; chuonghai chu Abraham ṭhalbea insieng ni hai sien khawm;
amiruokchu, anni laia thlatuhai sui sa ve naw khan Abrahama inthawk- in sâwma pakhat a lâk a, thutiemhai vawngtu chu mal a sâwm ta sih a.
Nisienlakhawm, sêl ruol loin a chîn lem chu a lien lem malsâwm pêkin a um hlak.
Chun, hitaka hin mihriem thi hlakhai hin sâwma pakhat an hmu hlak a, chutaka ruok chun, “a hring zing,” tia a thu an inhriettir chun a hmu a nih.
Chun, Levi sâwma pakhat la hlaktu hmanin, Abraham kuta khan sâwma pakhat a pêk tah, ti thei a nih;
Melkizedekin a lo tuok lai khan a pa ṭhâlbeah a la um sih a.

Chuongchun, Levihai thiempu nîna leia famkimna hmu thei a ni chun (chu hnuoia chun mihaiin Dân thu an lo hmu sih a), Aron um dân anga ruot loin, Melkizedek um dân anga thiempu dang hung um hi ieng am a ngai na?
Thiempu nîna chu a hung danglam ta leiin Dân thu chu suk- danglam ve a hung ngai ta hrim a nih.
Hieng a thu an ihril hi hnam dang mi a ni sih a, chu hnam laia mi chu tûkhawm mâichâmah an châng ngai nawh.
Ei Lalpa chu Juda hnam laia inthawka hung suok a ni ti ân lang fel sih a, chu hnam thua chun Mosiein thiempuhai kawng thu iengkhawm a hril nawh.
Chun, ei thu hril kha nasatakin chieng nâwkzuol a tih: Melkizedek anga thiempu dang,
tisa thupêk Dân thu anga siem mi ni lo, hring tâwp nei lo, thilthaw- theina anga siem lem mi, a hung um ding chun:
“Nang chu Melkizedek um dân anga, Chatuon thiempu i nih ie,” ti inhriettir a ni sih a.
A hrât naw le a ṭhathnem nawna leiin thupêk um hmasa chu peiin a um a.
Dân thu chun iengkhawm a sukfamkim si nawh. Beiseina ṭha lem lâk lûta hung um hin Pathien a mîn hnaitir lem a nih.
Chun, inkhâm naw a ni naw leiin, anni chu inkhâm loa thiempua siem an ni sih a,
ama ruok chun, “ ‘Nang chu chatuona Thiempu i nih,’ tiin Lalpa ân khâm a, inkîr nâwk ta naw ni,” tia hriltu kut khan (inkhâma Thiem- pua siem a ni lem),
chuong ang bawka nasa chun Isu chu thuthlung ṭha lem sukdet- puitu a hung ni tah a.
Chun, anni ruok chu thi leia um sawng thei an ni naw leiin, thiempua siem an tam ngei a;
ama ruok chu chatuona a um zing leiin a Thiempu nina chu thleng thei ruol loin a nei ta lem a nih.
Chuongchun, amaa Pathien kuoma hunghai chu a tâwp khâwk chenin a sandam thei bawk a nih; anni ṭawngṭai pêk dingin chatuona a hring zing leiin.
Chuong ang, Thiempu Laltak, mi inthieng, sawisêlbo, inthieng naw- na kai lo, mi suolhai laia inthawka a tuma um, vânhai nêka chunghnung lema siem ta chu ei ta dingin a âwm hrim sih a.

Chuong thiempu lalhai chun ni tin mâni suolna leiin inthawina an inhlân hmasa zet a, chu hnungah mihai suolna leiin an inhlân nâwk a. Chuong chu ama ta ding chun a ngai nawh, ama le ama ân hlân fâwm lai khan ṭum khatah a lo suktlingtla ta leiin.
Dân thu chun mihriem hrât nawna neihai chu, Thiempu Laltakah a ruot hlak a; inkhâm thu, Dân thu hnunga hung um ruok chun, Naupa chatuona dinga sukfamkim ta chu a ruot lem a nih.
